WorkItem.Description:
For my Feral Druid, I downloaded:
http://www.sonic.net/~nk31/rawr/triumph.cost.xml
 
And imported the item costs by going to Tools->Item Cost->Load... and importing this file.  When I Optimize with the Additional Requirement of 'Cost <= 100', it recommends I swap out my Malfurion's Triumph Gear with rogue VanCleef's gear.
 
If I edit a VanCleef piece, for example the VanCleef's Helmet of Conquet, I can confirm that Rogue is the only class selected for this.
